# version

**Instance Property**

A value the equals function uses to represent change in the configuration instance.

## Declaration

```swift
var version: Int { get }
```

## Discussion

This integer changes when you call [doc://com.apple.Translation/documentation/Translation/TranslationSession/Configuration/invalidate()] on an instance of your translation session.
title: version
